title: Strengthening Social Sector Practical Competencies Through Learner-Centered Education Paradigms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science theories and job-related experience
context.additional_context: Building personalized learning environments using digital devices and designing field-applicable projects

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80%+ learning goal completion rate using personalized learning tools (e.g., digital planners)
Learners produce concrete action plans for solving real-world social problems through project-based learning
Learners apply self-directed learning strategies to implement learned content in practical settings at least twice within four weeks after course completion
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
